titleStmt.title: Love and obedience or, Christs precept and promise. Being a sermon preached on Whitsunday last, 28 of May, 1637. in Guild-hall chappell, before the right honorable the Lord Major of this city of London.
titleStmt.author: Freake, William

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Okes dwelling in little-Saint Bartholomewes.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
